"@Miyo":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a8bfd8636872795f590600#post_54a8bfd8636872795f590600
[bq="Miyo"]"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a8be6e6368723c731c0100#post_54a8be6e6368723c731c0100

Sonniku was taking a stroll through a factory of miasma, because he thought it would be a good fucking idea to inhale the diseased chemicals.

Tarisu was also there, rotating dat ass so his two tails could fly.

Knuckaru was following as well.

"boy this is a woNDERFUL DAY IANT IT BOYZ" Sonikku exclaimed.

"SONNIKU SHUT THE FUKC UP MY NONEXISTENT EARS" said Knuckaru.

Eggumang arrived in his infamous dickmobil. The fight was about to engage between the dictator and the anthropomorphic animals.

God my fingers, ill type the rest in a second[/bq]

who remembers this

[bq="Miyo"]"BACK FUAR MOAR, EGGU-BAKA?" the hedgehog shouted. Eggu wasn't having his shit. Eggu silenced the rude-mouthed Sonniku with his notorious Ball-Buster move. Sonniku was knocked unconsious by the metalic fake genitalia. 

"SONNIKKU SENPAI" Tarisu roared as he saw Sonikku get smothered by the dickmobil.

One second taking another typing break[/bq]

topics.body:
"@Miyo":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54a8c3746368725ab4cf0100#post_54a8c3746368725ab4cf0100
[bq="Miyo"][spoiler]Tarisu's deek  grew 3 sized that day. They engaged in dick combat. However,  the metal dickmobil started to hurt like shit so he stopped. Tarisu was huffing and puffing and realized his feelings for Eggu. He placed a kiss on his lips and held on to him tightly. [/spoiler]

"STOLE YO BITCH SOMIKKU" eggu exclaimed. Eggu ran off with the emurados.

"TAIRUSU YOU FUCK BALL" Sonikku shouted. 

To be continued maybe[/bq]

"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54d029096368723b95df0100#post_54d029096368723b95df0100
Since you stopped reading, let me tell you in a nutshell.

There were demons.
There were anti-magic bombs.
Fairy Tail beat demons.
Anti-magic bombs destroyed by dragons.
Dragons are ghosts.
Fairy tail disbanded.
One year later.
